ðŸ“– Summary: Llama Stack offers a unified API and plugin architecture for building AI applications, supporting various environments (local, cloud, mobile). It provides prepackaged distributions and multiple developer interfaces to streamline development and deployment. The project includes standalone applications demonstrating production-grade AI application building.
